text: Phira'aunale bhanna thalyo ki ke mero anumati bina nai timiharule usamathi imana lya'ihalyau? Nihsandeha yahi timro pramukha ho jasale timila'i jadu sika'eko cha, thika cha, aba ma timra hata ra khutta ulta–sidha kata'era timiharula'i khajurako rukhama phamsima jhundya'idinechu. Ra timiharula'i avasya thaha bha'ihalne cha ki hamimadhye kasako yatana dherai kathora ra sthayi cha.’’
